ResearchProjectDef.label: Power
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the basics of power generation to help your colonists survive in this harsh climate. This advancement unlocks conduits and battaries.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Renewable power I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the basics of power generation from renewable resourses of this planet. This advancement unlocks Wind Turbine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Renewable power II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in power technology, give your colonists the ability to harness the power of the sun. Unlocks the solar powered generator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Renewable power III
ResearchProjectDef.description: What do you do when the sun doesn't shine? Solar power is great, except when it's dark! This advancement in power generation unlocks the geothermal generator that can harness the power of the planet!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Renewable power IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows to build advanced power plants: Gauss wind turbine and thermoelectric generator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Convectional power I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the basics of power generation from Convectional resourses of this planet. This advancement unlocks Steam Generator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Convectional power II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in power technology, give your colonists the ability to use some convectional resourses fo obtaining electricity. Unlocks the Coal Power Plant.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Convectional power III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows to build advanced power plant for refining some fuel - Fuel Power Plant.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Plasma power I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows to build advanced power plant - Tesla Ligthning Generator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Plasma power II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Open secrets of electromagnetics. Allows to build eco-friendly plasma generators.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Plasma power III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Dynamic Electromagnetics allows you to fabricate advanced buildings using electromagnetic components. This unlocks the upper teir of power generation and technology found in every Glitter world installation for building Xenon-Ion Turbine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Infrastructure I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build different Lamps, Small coolers and heaters and some Vents. Also increases battery efficiency by 15 percent.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Infrastructure II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build Autodoors, Medium coolers and heaters, Utility Walls. Also increases battery efficiency by 15 percent.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Infrastructure III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build Heavy Power Conduits, Hidden Conduits and Industrial coolers and heaters. Also increases battery efficiency by 15 percent.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Infrastructure IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build some advanced Ductwork Elements, Geothermal Heaters and Fission Batteries.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nuclear power I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced knowledge of power generation allows you to build some Gas Centrifuge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nuclear power II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Geothermal power is great, except when you can't find a steam vent! Advanced knowledge of power generation allows you to build a nuclear reactor.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nuclear power III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced knowledge of power generation allows you to build a Military nuclear plant.
